metadata.name: Orientation of Grounding
metadata.description:
This NFT is created as an overlay to a tangible Artwork. 
Displayed onto the painting, this NFT unlocks an optical illusion. Blending the digital with the traditional, this series of surreal landscapes present a multilayered sensorial oasis, questioning the elusive nature of reality itself. 

In-Tangible Futures, presented 10 new works at West Chelsea Contemporary Gallery in New York in conjunction with NFT NYC Conference of 2022. 

Exploring new horizons on the frontier of this emerging technology, we fuse both real and imagined landscapes into portals of infinite possibilities

Created in collaboration with interactive installation artists Oliver Allaux, Alex Allaux & Lyora Pissarro. 

*With the purchase of this NFT comes the Physical painting. Should the NFT be sold, the physical artwork must be sold with it. 

For more information visit:  
www.lyorapissarro.com/nftpaintings
